title: Jordan Peterson, Jonathan Pageau, Pastoral Commentary on the First Hour
description:
This is unquestionably the most important conversation Jordan Peterson has posted since his recovery from Benzo withdrawal. I posted two portions of this on March 1. This is all of the pieces combined. 

0:00-22:00 Reflections on the First impressions. https://twitter.com/PaulVanderKlay/status/1366302272183885827
22:00-59:00 Part One already posted
59:00-3:01:00 New Material

the conversation on Youtube https://youtu.be/2rAqVmZwqZM
